subject: Skiing
Alpine Skiing
World Cup (Skiing)
lead_paragraph: Tina Maze of Slovenia captured the women’s downhill at the Alpine world ski championships in Beaver Creek, Colo., to earn her second medal there. She has hopes of three more.
snippet: Tina Maze of Slovenia captured the women’s downhill at the Alpine world ski championships in Beaver Creek, Colo., to earn her second medal there. She has hopes of three more.
